title: End of season Honor and Chat Restrictions
body:
Heads up to everyone that did not know or may be newer to the game like myself.
At this stage of the season, if you get your even FIRST chat restriction (as minor as it may be) you lose all end of season rewards. 

Ive never had a single disciplinary issue before, and PG13 rated lost my cool on a duo harassing a random teammate, and I had enough, I asked them to stop and got a little negative, but never cussing or becoming as vulgar or hateful as they did. And I got my first ever chat restriction. Riot is unsympathetic and has stripped all my honor and rewards.

I have wasted hundreds of dollars on this game. To have no equal opportunity for redemption or plan in place for timing allowing players to waste a whole season is so unfortunate. If you had an issue earlier in the season, you probably restored your honor by now.... but regardless of level, they strip you down to 1 at any stage in the game...... 

Dock me an entire honor level, but to reset me after going so far after trying to stand up for a stranger....especially for a first offense...? wow..

Good luck in your business endeavors and recruiting new players, Riot. You need to re-evaluate your system

One of the things that irritate me the most is the fact that the penalty doesn't seem to take into account any form of context. Riot chose a system where when you're the victim of a slient troll for instance, ruining your duo bot lane by stealing every farm and this rendering you completly useless since you're farm dependent, you have no tool to handle it. You can't vent, or you et reported for being negative, you can't farm, can't really go jungle unless you want your own jungler to get mad, and you have very little chance to get a win in the end.
You can report it, sure, but for what ? there's not even a corresponding category. So i you ever try to stand for yourself, well then you're the annoyance and the bad guy and you can't really leave either. 

It happened so often lately, can't seem to remember it happening so often previous seasons but i could be wrong. I tried contacted the support team, asked them what were their plans or if they were acutally planning to work something the player could to use to work around this kind of behaviour. Their only answer was basically telling me to suck it and reminding me anymore negativity on my account could end in a ban. I'm so thankful i contacted them.  thanks, for nothing.

One thing I find funny is they say a chat restriction is supposed to be a very small punishment, but it’s effects are lasting for months. its ridiculous when you think about how your reformation depends on wether your teammates honor you or not. Riot probably doesn’t even look at your chat logs to see if you are reforming. All that matters is the result, getting honors, not how you got there.

"player support" didnt seem to want to work with me. (they didnt even a little)
. i felt like i was at the DMV and I knew I was not a customer they care about. 

Ive worked Customer Service and know thats not an easy gig, but... ouch

My Lesson was learned, I would never talk in chat again....isnt that the point of warnings?  But they really want to dial it home.  Like it costs them something to give out their "rewards" that sadly matter to a lot of us more than they should..

losing your cool 1/1000 games after being berated or harassed a good many of them (support main life).... i deserve a parade... not shame.

From what I can tell, they tied their own hands by stating that they would not alter punishments under any circumstances. I had the exact same experience, their official policy is to never undermine the system that they have put in place. They aren't your normal company where we pay for a service and they are expected to meet our expectations as a result. Instead, we play their game for free so they can do whatever they want and the only thing they care about is making us want to spend money, whether we actually support their game or not makes no difference to them because others will.

I am not going to comment if honor loss for chat punishments is okay or not. I only tell you that many people who have been punished do complain about that.

Instead, I tell you that the first chat restriction you get is pretty much Riots way of telling you to start behaving, or risk losing your account. Since it was your first ever punishment, you now have up to two more chances left before the final punishment (Permanent suspension). It is now up to you if you start behaving, or lose your investment to your account (money, time, friends, etc). I wish you learn to control your behavior and avoid any further punishments. That way you should be able to earn the rewards the next season.

PS: I did glance over your chat logs and found some parts which can (and did) get you punished (For example rank shaming, giving up mentality and insults towards your team). You need to get rid of that behavior if you wish to keep your account. Ah, and I didn't like your camouflaged KYS message there.
